name: Scenario_PreAlpha_FortifiedHouse_A_B
journelText:
Much as I would have loved to render the fility little rodents into energy for myself, Andy convinced me that our need for munitions was greater and thus I set the thralls to dismantaling the traps around the house, filling our bags with a great amount of ammo and even an intact weapon. 

[BUTTON](EXIT){Move on} [EFFECT](ADD_AMMO){50} [EFFECT](ADD_WEAPON){Revolver_Ranged}
